data.name: command.call.ask_sirena_id
data.value: Please provide Sirena's ID to call. It must be Sirena that you own or you are responsible for

data.name: command.call.description
data.value: Call Sirena by number or by id

data.name: command.call.error.value_not_id
data.value: *Value is incorrect!*

data.name: command.call.explanation_rights
data.value: You can call Sirenas that were created by you or those Sirenas, that the owner gave you the rights to call

data.name: command.call.extra_info
data.value: You can send extra information for subscribers or just click the *Call* button.

data.name: command.call.last_call
data.value: Last call was made recently by *{0}* at {1} UTC. Please wait {2} until next try.

data.name: command.call.not_allowed
data.value: You are not allowed to call Sirena *\"{0}\"* with ID: `{1}`

data.name: command.call.other
data.value: [other person](tg://user?id={0})

data.name: command.call.success
data.value: {0} subscribers were notified

data.name: command.call.user
data.value: *you*

data.name: command.create_sirena.error.limit_reached
data.value: *You've reached the limit!* You can't create new sirenas anymore. Please remove one of your sirenas and try again.

data.name: command.create_sirena.error.no_title
data.value:
Please insert title of the Sirena. Title must be between {0} and {1} symbols long.
_Alternatively you can create Sirena via command syntax:_ `/create title_of_sirena`

data.name: command.create_sirena.error.no_user
data.value: We can't find user with id: {0}

data.name: command.create_sirena.error.unknown
data.value: Unknown error. Sirena wasn't created.

data.name: command.create_sirena.success
data.value: Sirena with ID: `{0}` has been created successfuly. Tap ID to copy. Share it with the subscribers.

data.name: command.create.description
data.value: Creates a Sirena

data.name: command.delegate.description
data.value: Delegate rights to call Sirena to another user

data.name: command.delegate.error.incorrect_id
data.value: {0} parameter is incorrect. First parameter has to be serial number or ID of your sirena

data.name: command.delegate.error.incorrect_paramters
data.value: Please input: `/delegate {siren number or id} {user id}`

data.name: command.delegate.error.incorrect_user_id
data.value: {0} parameter is incorrect. Second parameter must be *UID* of user that will get rights to call the Sirena.

data.name: command.delegate.error.no_sirena
data.value: You don't have a Sirena with ID: `{0}`

data.name: command.delegate.success
data.value: User {0} has been set as a responsible for Sirena: `{1}`

data.name: command.delete.ask_sirena_id
data.value: To delete a Sirena, please insert *Sirena's ID or serial number* that is owned by you.

data.name: command.delete.cancel
data.value: â›”ï¸ No

data.name: command.delete.confirm
data.value: âœ… Yes

data.name: command.delete.description
data.value: Delete your Sirena by ID or by Serial number

data.name: command.delete.header
data.value: Select Sirena you want to *DELETE*:

data.name: command.delete.no_sirenas
data.value: You haven't created any Sirena yet.

data.name: command.delete.notification
data.value: You are going to delete Sirena: *{0}* ID: `{1}` *Are your sure?* This action can't be canceled.

data.name: command.delete.success
data.value: Sirena *\"{0}\"* has been deleted

data.name: command.display_sirenas.no_created
data.value: You haven't created any Sirena yet.

data.name: command.display_sirenas.subscribers
data.value: _Subscribers[{0}]_

data.name: command.display_sirenas.title
data.value: The list of your sirens:

data.name: command.find.description
data.value: Find Sirena by key string

data.name: command.find.header
data.value: Found sirenas:

data.name: command.find.input_phrase
data.value: *Please input search phrase*. Search phrase has to be at least {0} symbols length but less than {1} symbols.

data.name: command.find.no_id
data.value: There is no Sirena with this ID: \"{0}\". Please check input ID.

data.name: command.find.no_title
data.value: There is no Sirena with title that contains: \"{0}\". Please try another key phrase.

data.name: command.get_requests.header
data.value: Reuqests list

data.name: command.get_requests.no_requests
data.value: There are no requests for delegation of rights

data.name: command.get_requests.request_template
data.value: . User *{0}|{1}* is requesting rights to call Sirena {2}

data.name: command.get_responsibles.incorrect_parameters
data.value: Please use next syntax to get list of responsible users: `/responsible {sirena id or number}`

data.name: command.get_responsibles.no_sirena
data.value: Sirena wasn't found

data.name: command.get_responsibles.no_sirena_id
data.value: There is no sirena with id *{0}*

data.name: command.get_responsibles.no_sirena_number
data.value: You don't have sirena with number *{0}*

data.name: command.get_responsibles.template
data.value: Sirena *\"{0}\"* supervisors: {1} - Owner

data.value: "*List of commands* "

data.name: command.info.description
data.value: Display Sirena detailed information and available commands for itself

data.name: command.list.description
data.value: Shows a list of Sirenas that are being tracked

data.value: Displays primary bot functions

data.name: command.menu.title

data.name: command.mute_user.impossbile_mute
data.value: *You can't mute this user for the sirena.* Possible causes: you aren't subscibed to this sirena, target user isn't responsible for call of this sirena.

data.name: command.mute_user.incorrect_id
data.value: {0} parameter is incorrect. Second parameter has to be serial number or ID of your sirena

data.name: command.mute_user.incorrect_parameters
data.value: Please input: `/mute {user id to mute} {sirena id}`

data.name: command.mute_user.incorrect_uid
data.value: {0} parameter is incorrect. First parameter has to be *UID* of user that is already responsible for sirena. And you won't to revoke they rights.

data.name: command.mute_user.no_sirena
data.value: Couldn't find sirena to mute user

data.name: command.mute_user.success
data.value: User {0} has been muted. Now you will not get notifications from the user for the Sirena: *{1}* If you subscribed to any other *Sirena* that user can calls, you still able to get notifications from this user. To unmute user use command `/unmute`

data.name: command.mute.description
data.value: Mute calls from certain user for certain Sirena. Calls of the Sirena from other users will be active anyway

data.name: command.request_rights.already_sent
data.value: You have *already sent* a permission request for the sirena.

data.name: command.request_rights.fail
command.request_rights.incorrect_parameters
data.value: Incorrect parameters. Please use syntax: /request {sirena id} [request message] You can send request message or skip it. But you have to set correc sirena id

data.name: command.request_rights.success
data.value: You have successfuly sent a a permission request for the sirena: {0}

data.name: command.request.description
data.value: Request owner of Sirena to delegate right to call Sirena

data.name: command.requests.description
data.value: Display a list of requests for permission to launch a Sirena

data.name: command.responsible.description
data.value: Display list of user allowed to call Sirena

data.name: command.revoke_rights.fail
data.value: You couldn't revoke rights from the user. Possible reasons: user doesn't have rights or you don't own this Sirena: {0}

data.name: command.revoke_rights.incorrect_parameters
data.value: Please input: `/revoke {sirena number or id} {user id}`

data.name: command.revoke_rights.incorrect_sirena_param
data.value: {0} parameter is incorrect. First parameter must be serial number or ID of your Sirena

data.name: command.revoke_rights.incorrect_uid
data.value: {0} parameter is incorrect. Second parameter must be *UID* of user that is already responsible for the Sirena.

data.name: command.revoke_rights.success
data.value: The user: {0} has been deprived of his rights to call the sirena: {1}

data.name: command.revoke.description
data.value: Take back rigths to call Sirena of another user

data.name: command.sirena_info.general_info
command.sirena_info.last_call
data.value: Last call: {0}

data.name: command.start.welcome
data.value:
Welcome to *Sirena bot*! This bot proivdes a mechanism for quick notifications. You can create notifications (*Sirena*). People subscribes to your notification. When time comes just call the Sirena and all of the subscribers will get your message.
You can use *Menu* (/menu) to manage the bot. You can call commands directly either. To find out full list of the commands please use /help command.

data.name: command.subscribe.askSirenaId
data.value:
*Please input Sirena ID*. You have to input exact ID of Sirena that you are going to subscribe to.
You can use *Find* command to find a Sirena by title.

data.name: command.subscribe.description
data.value: Subscribes to Sirena by id

data.name: command.subscribe.notExists
data.value:
*Attempt to subscribe is failed.* Possible reasons: 1. There is no Sirena with such id; 2. You are the owner of the Sirena.
You can try to input another *Sirena ID*

data.name: command.subscribe.success
data.value: You successfully subscribed to *Sirena*: _{0}_

data.name: command.subscriptions.description
data.value: Displays you current subscriptions

data.name: command.subscriptions.header
data.value: *Your subscriptions:*

data.name: command.subscriptions.noSubscriptions
data.value: You don't have any subscription yet.

data.name: command.unmute.description
data.value: Unmute previously muted user for certain Siren

data.name: command.unsubscribe.description
data.value: Unsubscribes from certain Sirena

data.name: command.unsubscribe.fail
data.value: *Unsubscription failed.* Possible reasons: you're not listener of the Sirena or this sirena doens't exist.

data.name: command.unsubscribe.success
data.value: You successfully unsubsribed.
